t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - Buy for Me is currently live in the Amazon Shopping app on both iOS and Android for a subset of U.S. customers. We will begin testing with a limited number of brand stores and products, with plans to roll out to more customers and incorporate more brand stores and products based on feedback.

t: Shop brands directly - Amazon Customer Service
s: For results with the Buy for Me icon, Amazon makes purchases on your behalf. This means that you don’t have to leave Amazon’s App to buy a product sold by an external brand website. When you select Buy for Me, Amazon places the order for you on the brand website.
